rules.description: Always use Bootstrap's SCSS mixins (e.g., media-breakpoint-up, media-breakpoint-down) for media queries instead of raw @media rules.
Prefer Bootstrap utility classes and CSS variables for common styling before writing custom CSS.
Define SCSS variables at the top level or in variables files, not inside style rules.
Do not use CSS variables in SCSS logic or conditionals.
Use DOM methods (e.g., textContent) instead of document.write for dynamic content.
Avoid empty Bootstrap columns unless necessary; add a comment if intentional.
Use only let and const for variable declarations in JavaScript. Do not use var.
